16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">1940</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">而如今计算机的研究也不再只限于枯燥的机器内部的结构或者编程的研究。下面我举几个例子带你了解计算机的趣味性：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">假设有一个公共汽车站，平均</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">10</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">分钟过一趟载客量为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">50</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人的车。而平均</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">10</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">分钟会有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">30</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个人来等车。突然有天举办奥运，平均</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">10</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">分钟会有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">60</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个人来等车。作为公汽公司，你会将每辆车的载客量增加到多少以至于不改变乘客的平均候车时间呢？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">100</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人？或是大于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的系统里有个车站平均</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> 10 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">分钟有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> 30 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人排队并被载客量为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">50</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人的车载走，平均排队时间是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> T(a)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。在世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的系统里也有个同样的车站平均</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">10 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">分钟有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> 30 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人排队也被载客量为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">50</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">人的车载走，平均排队时间是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> T(b)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。如果我们从世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> C </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">同时观察</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">会得到什么样的结论呢？没错，单位时间里世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的排队人数和上车人数是世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的两倍，而世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> B </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的平均候车时间却是世界</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> A </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的一半。也就是说在上面的例子里如果因排队人数翻倍而将载客量也翻倍，乘客的平均候车时间将会降至原来的二分之一！</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">不要小看看似简单的这种排队候车问题，小到计算机系统的模拟，大到搜索引擎的网页排名，无一不用到了上述的候车问题。这就是在计算机系统（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">System</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">）研究里常用到的排队原理（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Queuing theory</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">）。而如果仅用我们的常识来解决问题，得出的往往都是错误的结论。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">我们再看一个哲学点的例子。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">请证明人不能用自己的方法来判定自己方法的有效性。这里的有效性是指可以在有限步骤内解决一个的问题。什么？学计算机也要证明类似</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> “ </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">你妈是不是你妈</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"> ” </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的问题？没错，这就是计算机理论（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Theory</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">）研究里著名的停机问题（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Halting problem</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">）。而如此深奥的问题最后却被图灵以一种及其简单的方式证明出来，并由此奠定了计算机语言设计，编译及实现的基础。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">我们再看一个不深奥但却丝毫不简单的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
line-height:21.0pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">假设铁轨上有五个小孩在玩，停用的岔轨上有一个小孩在玩，你要把车转移到岔轨上压死一个孩子救下五个吗？如果那一个在停用的岔轨上的孩子是你的亲人，你又会怎么选择呢？</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这是一个英国哲学家费丽帕</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">·</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">弗特在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">1967</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">年提出的电车问题（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Trolley
Problem</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">）。值得思考的是大多数人在停用岔轨不是自己的亲人的条件下，会选择救下五个人，而在知道了岔轨上是自己亲人的条件下会选择袖手旁观。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:6.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
